summary.span: 命名空間提供類別以連接、監控和管理網路上的訊息佇列，以及傳送、接收或窺視 (Peek) 訊息。

span.span: The namespace provides classes that allow you to connect to, monitor, and administer message queues on the network and send, receive, or peek messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 成員類別包含下列方法來讀取和寫入訊息至佇列：Members of the class include the following methods for reading and writing messages to the queue: - 方法可讓您可以將訊息寫入佇列的應用程式。The method enables your application to write messages to the queue. 方法的多載可讓您指定是否要傳送郵件使用（這樣會提供詳細控制您傳送的資訊） 或任何其他 managed 的物件，包含特定應用程式類別。Overloads of the method enable you to specify whether to send your message using a (which provides detailed control over the information you send) or any other managed object, including application-specific classes. 方法也支援傳送訊息，做為交易的一部分。The method also supports sending messages as part of a transaction. - ， ，和方法提供從佇列讀取訊息的功能。The , , and methods provide functionality for reading messages from a queue. 像方法，這些方法提供多載，可支援交易式佇列處理。Like the method, these methods provide overloads that support transactional queue processing. 這些方法也會提供多載的逾時。These methods also provide overloads with time-out. Out 參數可讓處理作業能夠繼續佇列是否空白。Out parameters that enable processing to continue if the queue is empty. 這些方法是同步處理的範例，因為它們中斷目前的執行緒，直到訊息為止，除非您指定逾時。Because these methods are examples of synchronous processing, they interrupt the current thread until a message is available, unless you specify a time-out. - 方法很類似，但不會造成讀取時，從佇列移除訊息。The method is similar to , but it does not cause a message to be removed from the queue when it is read. 因為不會變更佇列的內容中，沒有任何多載，可以支援交易式處理。Because does not change the queue contents, there are no overloads to support transactional processing. 不過，因為、 like ，以同步方式從佇列讀取訊息，並支援方法的多載，指定逾時，以防止無限期等候的執行緒。However, because , like , reads messages synchronously from the queue, overloads of the method do support specifying a time-out in order to prevent the thread from waiting indefinitely. - ， ， ，和方法提供的方式，以非同步方式從佇列讀取訊息。The , , , and methods provide ways to asynchronously read messages from the queue. 它們不會中斷目前的執行緒等候訊息到達佇列中。They do not interrupt the current thread while waiting for a message to arrive in the queue. 下列的方法類別提供用來依指定的準則擷取佇列的清單，並判斷特定的佇列是否存在的功能：The following methods of the class provide functionality for retrieving lists of queues by specified criteria and determining if specific queues exist: - 允許在電腦上私用佇列的擷取。 enables the retrieval of the private queues on a computer. - ，和提供通用準則來擷取公用佇列的方式。, , and provide ways to retrieve public queues by common criteria. 多載提供更進一步的詳細資料選取的數字的搜尋準則為基礎的佇列。An overload of provides even finer detail for selecting queues based on a number of search criteria. 其他的方法類別提供下列功能：Other methods of the class provide the following functionality: - 建立和刪除訊息佇列的佇列。Creating and deleting Message Queueing queues. - 若要逐步執行佇列中訊息使用訊息列舉值。Using a message enumerator to step through the messages in a queue. - 使用佇列的列舉值逐一查看系統上的佇列。Using a queue enumerator for iterating through the queues on the system. - 設定 ACL 為基礎的存取權限。Setting ACL-based access rights. - 若要使用的連線快取。Working with the connection cache. 類別會提供詳細的資訊傳送到佇列，控制，而且使用物件接收或窺視訊息從佇列中時。The class provides detailed control over the information you send to a queue, and is the object used when receiving or peeking messages from a queue. 除了在訊息本文的內容類別包含通知設定，格式器選取項目、 識別、 驗證和加密資訊、 時間戳記、 使用追蹤、 伺服器日誌的相關指示，寄不出信件佇列和交易資料。Besides the message body, the properties of the class include acknowledgment settings, formatter selection, identification, authentication and encryption information, timestamps, indications about using tracing, server journaling, and dead-letter queues, and transaction data. 元件都與下列三個格式器，可讓您在序列化和還原序列化訊息從佇列傳送及接收：The component is associated with the following three formatters, which enable you to serialize and deserialize messages sent and received from queues: - 提供鬆散偶合的傳訊，啟用用戶端和伺服器上的序列化類型的獨立版本設定。The provides loosely coupled messaging, enabling independent versioning of serialized types on the client and server. - 與 MSMQ COM 控制項。The is compatible with the MSMQ COM control. 它可讓您傳送控制項可接收的類型，並接收已由控制項傳送的型別。It allows you to send types that can be received by the control and to receive types that were sent by the control. - 提供更快的替代選項，但沒有鬆散偶合的傳訊的優點。The provides a faster alternative to the , but without the benefit of loosely coupled messaging. 中的其他類別`Messaging`命名空間支援的程式碼存取和 ACL 為基礎的安全性篩選時從佇列讀取訊息，並使用交易時傳送和接收訊息的屬性。Other classes in the `Messaging` namespace support code-access and ACL-based security, filtering properties when reading messages from a queue, and using transactions when sending and receiving messages.
